title: Pibbs 514 Kwik Dri Dryer Big Sale!
description:
PIBBS 514 KWIK DRI DRYER W / CASTER BASE 13" X 19"

* Top selling dryer with about 1100 watts, an adjustable height stand, flip top visor, timer control, thermostat and control warning light.
* Warnning : Users must use hair net with this product! Hair should be pinned down orrestrained with this dryer due to the upward air flow.
* Dries very fast. Made in Italy.

title: Schwarzkopf BC Bonacure Repair Rescue Sealed Ends 2.6 oz (color packaging may vary)
description: Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends - repair rescue for damaged or bleached hair. Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends repairs hair breakage, seals and prevents split ends. CuraTec Proteins and the amino acid Glycine, aid the repair of split or broken ends. Softens and improves the combability of dry and brittle ends. Apply small amount of Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends to wet or dry hair. Smooth through the hair ends with the fingertips. Do not rinse out. Apply Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends to dry hair for general smoothing and sealing. (2.6 oz)
